panels.description:
EXAREL: Small read requests on devices
FD: performance flash
CD: hard disk
CF: capacity flash

targets.expr: CD_IO_BY_W_LG_SEC{objectName=~"${celldiskType}_.*",server=~"$server"}

panels.title: Large Write MiB/s

panels.description:
EXAREL: 
When using 'Show Latency': average, this shows the average small read latency on the devices.

When using 'Show Latency': max, this shows the maximum small read latency over 1 minute windows on the devices

FD: performance flash
CD: hard disk
CF: capacity flash

targets.expr: CD_IO_TM_R_SM_RQ{objectName=~"${celldiskType}_.*",server=~"$server"} BACKUP_20251024 BACKUP_20251030 EXPORT_20251209 backup_all.sh export_all.sh jq out.txt ( $show % 2 )
max_over_time(CD_IO_TM_R_SM_RQ{objectName=~"${celldiskType}_.*",server=~"$server"}[1m]) BACKUP_20251024 BACKUP_20251030 EXPORT_20251209 backup_all.sh export_all.sh jq out.txt ( $show % 3 )

list.description: Show latency averaged over time interval, or maximum over 1 minute windows. The maximum is useful for finding outliers.
list.label: Show Latency
list.name: show
